actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate of the United States of America that the United States Government should not undertake any efforts to interfere with the free market by encouraging OPEC or its members to adopt production controls to artificially raise oil prices.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the United States should not undertake any efforts to interfere with the free market by encouraging OPEC or its members to adopt production controls to artificially raise oil prices.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate of the United States of America that the United States Government should not undertake any efforts to interfere with the free market by encouraging OPEC or its members to adopt production controls to artificially raise oil prices.
